summary: The diff modifies frontend/index.html to reference a new favicon path (/assets/chess khelo online.png), which addresses part of REQ-1 (the favicon/logo asset path in index.html). However, there is no evidence in the diff of any React component being updated to render the correct logo image in the UI. The frontend-file-summaries.txt does not mention any logo component changes, and no logo asset file is added. The fix appears partial â€” only the HTML favicon reference is updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Any React components that render the logo should reflect the current/correct logo file and not serve a stale or missing image.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only updates the favicon reference in index.html. There is no evidence in the diff that any React component (e.g., a logo component or header) was updated to display the correct logo image in the UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: The logo asset file itself should be present/added so the reference does not result in a broken image.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new image asset files were added (ADDED FILES: none), yet the favicon now references /assets/chess khelo online.png. Without the asset being added, the favicon reference may still result in a broken/missing image.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive chess game features including castling rights, AI improvements, last-move highlights, sound hooks, background music hooks, game mode selector, and start game flow were modified or added.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request is scoped solely to fixing the logo display/update issue. None of these chess game feature changes were requested.
